fullText: The Visit is a show that works best when it embraces its operatic aspirations and worst when it tries to be a traditional Broadway musical.
dtliExcerpt: The Visit is a show that works best when it embraces its operatic aspirations and worst when it tries to be a traditional Broadway musical.

It doesn't clearly recommend or discourage seeing the show, hence a mixed classification. | Gemini: The review presents a mixed assessment, highlighting both strengths and weaknesses without a clear recommendation. | Kimi: The critic acknowledges effective elements (operatic style) while criticizing other aspects (traditional musical approach), indicating an inconsistent production that succeeds only intermittently.
